bioAsHtml: I am the head of the ActivePivot and ActiveMonitor R&D team at ActiveViam. We are developing a real-time, in-memory analytical database using the JAVA programming language. Our product is used by top-tier banks, e-commerce websites as well as logistics operators.

bio:
I am the head of the ActivePivot and ActiveMonitor R&D team at ActiveViam.
We are developing a real-time, in-memory analytical database using the JAVA programming language.
Our product is used by top-tier banks, e-commerce websites as well as logistics operators.
